birth_place.zh-cn: 中国医科大学附属第四医院
birth_place.en: The Fourth Affiliated Hospital of China Medical University

description.zh-cn: 商人，前中国国务院总理李鹏的次子。曾任武警安亚技术开发公司董事长、武警水电指挥部政治部副主任，拥有上校军衔。后因卷入新国大诈骗案，移民新加坡并成为该国公民。
description.en: A businessman and the second son of former Chinese Premier Li Peng. He served as the chairman of the Armed Police Anya Technology Development Company and the deputy director of the Political Department of the Armed Police Hydropower Command, holding the rank of colonel. He later immigrated to Singapore and became a citizen after being implicated in the New Guoda fraud case.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，曾任中华人民共和国国务院总理、中共中央政治局常委。
description.en: Chinese politician who served as the Premier of the State Council of the People's Republic of China and a member of the Standing Committee of the Politburo of the Communist Party of China.

description.zh-cn: 李鹏的妻子。
description.en: Wife of Li Peng.

description.zh-cn: 李鹏的长子，李小勇的哥哥。
description.en: The eldest son of Li Peng and the elder brother of Li Xiaoyong.

description.zh-cn: 李鹏的女儿，李小勇的姐姐。
description.en: The daughter of Li Peng and the elder sister of Li Xiaoyong.

description.zh-cn: 李小勇的妻子，香港滑冰联盟主席，新四军将领叶挺的孙女。
description.en: Wife of Li Xiaoyong, President of the Hong Kong Skating Union, and granddaughter of the New Fourth Army General Ye Ting.

description.zh-cn: 李小勇和叶小燕的女儿。
description.en: Daughter of Li Xiaoyong and Ye Xiaoyan.

description.zh-cn: 新四军将领，叶小燕的祖父。
description.en: A general of the New Fourth Army and the grandfather of Ye Xiaoyan.

description.zh-cn: 叶挺的儿子，叶小燕的父亲。
description.en: Son of Ye Ting and father of Ye Xiaoyan.

nodes.id: 中国医科大学附属第四医院

zh-cn: 中国医科大学附属第四医院
en: The Fourth Affiliated Hospital of China Medical University

description.zh-cn: 位于沈阳市的一家医院，前身为沈阳铁路局沈阳医院。是李小勇的出生地。
description.en: A hospital in Shenyang, formerly known as Shenyang Hospital of the Shenyang Railway Bureau. It is the birthplace of Li Xiaoyong.

nodes.id: 武警安亚技术开发公司

zh-cn: 武警安亚技术开发公司

description.zh-cn: 一家由李小勇担任董事长的公司，曾利用武警特权倒卖和走私军火。
description.en: A company chaired by Li Xiaoyong, which once used the privileges of the Armed Police to resell and smuggle arms.

description.zh-cn: 中国人民武装警察部队的一个单位。
description.en: A unit of the Chinese People's Armed Police Force.

description.zh-cn: 一种军衔。
description.en: A military rank.

description.zh-cn: 1998年发生的一起金融诈骗案，涉案金额高达5亿人民币，导致多人被判刑，李小勇亦因此案移民海外。
description.en: A financial fraud case that occurred in 1998, involving an amount of up to 500 million RMB. It resulted in the sentencing of several individuals, and Li Xiaoyong also immigrated abroad due to this case.

description.zh-cn: 东南亚的一个岛国及城市国家。
description.en: An island country and city-state in Southeast Asia.

description.zh-cn: 台湾商人，曾任新国大期货公司顾问，因新国大诈骗案被执行死刑。
description.en: A Taiwanese businessman who served as a consultant for New Guoda Futures Company. He was executed for his involvement in the New Guoda fraud case.

nodes.id: 中华人民共和国最高人民法院

zh-cn: 中华人民共和国最高人民法院
en: Supreme People's Court of the People's Republic of China

description.zh-cn: 李小勇是李鹏的次子。
description.en: Li Xiaoyong is the second son of Li Peng.

description.zh-cn: 李小勇是朱琳的儿子。
description.en: Li Xiaoyong is the son of Zhu Lin.

description.zh-cn: 李小勇是李小鹏的弟弟。
description.en: Li Xiaoyong is the younger brother of Li Xiaopeng.

description.zh-cn: 李小勇是李小琳的弟弟。
description.en: Li Xiaoyong is the younger brother of Li Xiaolin.

description.zh-cn: 叶丹丹是李小勇的女儿。
description.en: Ye Dandan is the daughter of Li Xiaoyong.

description.zh-cn: 叶小燕是叶挺将军的孙女。
description.en: Ye Xiaoyan is the granddaughter of General Ye Ting.

description.zh-cn: 叶小燕是叶正明的女儿。
description.en: Ye Xiaoyan is the daughter of Ye Zhengming.

relationships.target: 中国医科大学附属第四医院

description.zh-cn: 李小勇于1963年9月6日出生于沈阳市中国医科大学第四医院。
description.en: Li Xiaoyong was born on September 6, 1963, at The Fourth Affiliated Hospital of China Medical University in Shenyang.

relationships.target: 武警安亚技术开发公司

position.en: Deputy Director of the Political Department

description.zh-cn: 李小勇曾拥有上校军衔。
description.en: Li Xiaoyong once held the rank of Colonel.

description.zh-cn: 因卷入新国大诈骗案，李小勇全家投资移民新加坡，后归化为新加坡公民。
description.en: Due to his involvement in the New Guoda fraud case, Li Xiaoyong's entire family immigrated to Singapore as investors and he later became a naturalized Singaporean citizen.

description.zh-cn: 李小勇因卷入新国大诈骗案，避走海外并以香港户籍全家投资移民新加坡。
description.en: Due to his involvement in the New Guoda fraud case, Li Xiaoyong fled abroad and his entire family immigrated to Singapore as investors using their Hong Kong residency.

relationships.source: 中华人民共和国最高人民法院

description.zh-cn: 2001年5月29日，经最高人民法院核准，对因新国大诈骗案涉案的曹予飞执行死刑。
description.en: On May 29, 2001, with the approval of the Supreme People's Court, Cao Yufei, who was involved in the New Guoda fraud case, was executed.
